data.title: Eddie Murphy filmography
data.text:
Eddie Murphy at 2010 Tribeca Film Festival Filmography Feature films 44 Television series 15

The following is the filmography of American actor and comedian Eddie Murphy that includes his work in film and television.

Key † Denotes films that have not yet been released
